title: NO LP Gas distribution on Tuesday (24); Don’t wait in line – Litro
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Litro Gas announced on Monday (23) that there will be NO distribution of domestic LP Gas cylinders (12.5 kg, 5 kg, & 2.3 kg) on Tuesday (24).
The general public is requested NOT to wait in line for LP Gas, said Litro.
NO LP Gas distribution on Tuesday (24); Don’t wait in line – Litro
